column4: hi everyone. How can i reconfigure/recalibrate my Game Controllers buttons?
jscal from the joystick packages is a cli configuration

should be /dev/input/js0

you can "cat /dev/input/js0" and use the joystick to test
shows wierd signs, turns out it IS the device the js is on. thanks
